exitPage.title: Are you sure you want to exit?

previewPage.title: Pay {merchantName}

hints.networkFee: Helps get your transaction onto the blockchain by covering the costs for the network validators who process it
hints.transactionBuffer: This amount is added to help your purchase go through, even if crypto prices shift. This may leave some {settlementCurrency} in your wallet.

previewPage.disclaimer: Refunds will be issued in {settlementCurrency} only. The exchange rate and fees change frequently. All crypto purchases are final.
previewPage.pyusdNotice: The transaction will be completed using PayPal USD (PYUSD), which is a stablecoin issued and custodied by Paxos Trust Company, LLC. PYUSD runs on the blockchain.
previewPage.feeChanged: The network fee has changed. Please check your total and continue

titles.default: We're unable to process this payment

descriptions.insufficientFunds: Your balance is too low to complete this purchase.
descriptions.belowNetworkMinimum: This purchase amount is below your account's minimum exchange limit. Connect another account to complete your purchase.
descriptions.default: Your funds will stay in your {integrationName} account.

doneTransferPage.title: Payment on its way
doneTransferPage.description: You just paid {amount}. You'll get a confirmation from {clientName} when it's complete.
doneTransferPage.disclaimer: Transfers are not complete until they have received enough network confirmations.

doneTransferDetailsPage.title: What happened
doneTransferDetailsPage.disclaimer: Transfers are not complete until they have received enough network confirmations.

topupNeededPage.title: Top-up needed

description.singleSymbol: The value of the converted {convertedSymbol} to {targetSymbol} is lower than expected due to price and/or network fees fluctuations.
description.multipleSymbols: The value of the assets converted to {targetSymbol} is lower than expected due to price and/or network fees fluctuations.

topupNeededPage.disclaimer: If you do not complete the payment, your {targetSymbol} balance will remain in your {integrationName} account.

infoScreenPage.title: Log in to review payment details

rules.privacy: Your info is never stored. Access will end after this payment.
rules.control: Use your crypto, review details and approve to pay.

infoScreenPage.termsText: PayPal processes this merchant's payments. By continuing, you allow Mesh to access your account and transfer crypto to PayPal to pay for your purchase.

walletConfirmationPage.title: Confirm this transaction in your {integrationName} app

approveConnectionPage.title: Approve the connection request in your wallet

oauthStatusPage.title: Log into your account and allow access
